derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: French, literally coming back', present participle (used as a noun) of revenir

means.word_mean: 1. a person who returns after a lengthy absence
2. someone who has returned from the dead
1. of or relating to or typical of a revenant;

auth_sentence.content: He fell, each time, for an immortal a goddess, a muse, a revenant, a moonling.
